hopobject.name: nghost for head unit
hopobject.pname: port nghost for automotive infotainment system
hopobject.body: the detailed info loacated in http://www.openice.com, i am porting the nghost 2.02 to beagle board
hopobject.shortdesc: nghost is a open source project for car computer based on Linux, as a framework, it provide api for increasing new plugin
